ISO 8601 Recurring Time Intervals

Source: R/lookups.R
recode_iso8601.Rd

ISO 8601 Recurring Time Intervals

Usage

recode_iso8601(x)

Source

DCAT Schema: accrualPeriodicity

Arguments

x

<chr> vector of ISO8601 recurrence rules

Value

<chr> vector of human-readable recurrence rule descriptions

References

  • ISO 8601

  • ISO 8601 Repeating_intervals

  • Recurring Time Intervals

Examples

accrualPeriodicity = c(
  "R/PT1S",   "R/PT1H",  "R/P1D", "R/P3.5D",
  "R/P0.33W", "R/P0.5W", "R/P1W", "R/P2W",
  "R/P0.33M", "R/P0.5M", "R/P1M", "R/P2M",
  "R/P3M",    "R/P4M",   "R/P6M", "R/P1Y",
  "R/P2Y",    "R/P3Y",   "R/P4Y", "R/P10Y")

recode_iso8601(accrualPeriodicity)
#>  [1] "Continuously [R/PT1S]"          "Hourly [R/PT1H]"               
#>  [3] "Daily [R/P1D]"                  "Twice a Week [R/P3.5D]"        
#>  [5] "Three Times a Week [R/P0.33W]"  "Twice a Week [R/P0.5W]"        
#>  [7] "Weekly [R/P1W]"                 "Biweekly [R/P2W]"              
#>  [9] "Three Times a Month [R/P0.33M]" "Biweekly [R/P0.5M]"            
#> [11] "Monthly [R/P1M]"                "Bimonthly [R/P2M]"             
#> [13] "Quarterly [R/P3M]"              "Triannually [R/P4M]"           
#> [15] "Biannually [R/P6M]"             "Annually [R/P1Y]"              
#> [17] "Biennially [R/P2Y]"             "Triennially [R/P3Y]"           
#> [19] "Quadrennially [R/P4Y]"          "Decennially [R/P10Y]"
